resources.string: Introducing LycityBot, a bot that actively interacts with you to provide you with lyrics and information about your favourite songs
As the user, you can make small talk with the bot including asking it for lyrics to songs
LycityBot has been programmed to cater for all your lyrical needs. She will do her best to provide you with the most top notch information regarding the songs you look up
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
